summary: Frontend-only testing for Item-Level SKU Barcodes feature. All 8 features verified working correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports.

issues: Minor React hydration warning: <tr> cannot be child of <span> in staff presence table - cosmetic issue, no functional impact

passed_tests: ✅ Master QR code section removed from picklist page
✅ 'SKU Barcodes' section present with '(Scan for billing)' subtitle
✅ Individual barcode displayed for each order item (TEST01, TEST02)
✅ Barcode value is SKU only - no JSON, no order ID
✅ Product name shown above each barcode (test1, motor)
✅ Print view uses item-level barcodes (Code128, width=1.2, height=25)
✅ Print format shows: product name, location, qty, and barcode
✅ Help text: 'Scan each barcode and enter quantity in POS system'
✅ Mobile viewport: Item-level barcodes display correctly (390x844)
✅ Mobile: Barcodes stacked vertically for better readability
critical_code_review_comments: Implementation is correct: Using react-barcode library with BarcodeComponent
Screen barcode config: format='CODE128', width=1.5, height=40, fontSize=10
Print barcode config: format='CODE128', width=1.2, height=25, fontSize=8
QRCodeSVG import and Master QR code references completely removed from PicklistPage.js
seed_data_creation: Used existing order ORD-0001 with items: TEST01 (test1) and TEST02 (motor)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Item-Level SKU Barcodes feature fully implemented and tested. Master QR code removed, replaced with individual Code128 barcodes for each item. Each barcode shows only the SKU value (e.g., TEST01, TEST02). Format: product name above barcode, SKU × Qty shown, barcode below. Print view also uses item-level barcodes with compact sizing. Existing order used for testing: ORD-0001 (UUID: c3ed3e09-6fb7-4121-a4ca-ed03736a7a79).

master_qr_code_removed.details: No QRCodeSVG import, no 'Master Barcode' section present

sku_barcodes_section.details: Section titled 'SKU Barcodes' with '(Scan for billing)' subtitle

individual_item_barcodes.details: Each item has its own barcode: TEST01, TEST02

sku_only_value.details: Barcode value is item.sku - no JSON, no order ID

product_info_display.details: Product name and 'SKU × Qty' shown above each barcode

print_view_item_barcodes.details: Print view shows item-level barcodes with compact config (width=1.2, height=25)

mobile_responsiveness.details: Barcodes display correctly on mobile (390x844), stacked vertically
